title: HW01 - Sum Two Integers
description:
Sum Two Integers

Given two integers, return their sum.

Example:

  • Input: a = 5, b = 3
    Output: 8

Constraints:

  • Standard integer range
  • Simple addition operation
solution_text:
Sum Two Integers

Algorithm:

  1. Add the two numbers together
  2. Return the result

Time Complexity: O(1) - constant time

Space Complexity: O(1) - constant space

Key Insights:

  • Basic arithmetic operation
  • Uses built-in addition operator
solution_code:
def sumTwo(a, b):
    return a + b
verify:
def verify(actual_output, expected_output):
    """Verify the sum result"""
    passed = actual_output == expected_output
    return [passed, str(actual_output)]
